entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who is seriously suggesting an idea to Harry. She leans forward and speaks with conviction.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person who is watching Hermione with a frown on his face. He leans forward to listen to her suggestion.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person who is being addressed by Hermione and Ron. He has been looking forward to the weekend trip into Hogsmeade.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as a person who would not be happy if she found out what Hermione and Harry were up to. She is implied to have some kind of authority or power over them.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as a person who has appeared in the fire at the beginning of the story. He has been maintaining a stony silence since then.

relationships.description: Hermione speaks to Ron and suggests an idea to him.
Hermione suggests an idea to Harry, who is listening intently.
Ron listens to Hermione's suggestion and leans forward to hear more.
Hermione is concerned about what Umbridge would think if she found out their plan.
Harry is worried about Sirius's silence and his absence from the story.
